channel.title: [PI]How do I add eating custom food from packs[PI]
channel.description: title says it all really, i just need it here is what i have already in food.java well what i have made, took me fucking ages with the correct ammounts the codes and stuffs using your own client non dumped. [code=java] CAVE POTATO(18093,2,"Cave potato"), HEIM CRAB(18159,2,"Heim crab"), HEIM CRAB POTATO(18099,5,"Heim crab potato"), RED-EYE(18161,5,"Red-eye"), RED-EYE POTATO(18101,8,"Red-eye potato"), DUSK EEL(18163,7,"Dusk eel"), DUSK EEL POTATO(18103,10,"Dusk eel potato"), GIANT FLATFISH(18165,10,"Giant flatfish"), GIANT FLATFISH POTATO(18105,13,"Giant flatfish potato"), SHORT-FINNED EEL(18167,12,"Short finned eel"), SHORT-FINNED EEL POTATO(18107,15,"Short-finned eel potato"), WEB SNIPPER(18169,15,"Web snipper"), BOULDABASS(18171,17,"Bouldabass"), BOULDABASS POTATO(18111,20,"Bouldabass Potato"), Salve EEL(18173,20,"Salve eel"), SALVE EEL POTATO(18113,23,"Salve eel potato"), BLUE CRAB(18175,22,"Blue crab"), BLUE CRAB POTATO(18115,25,"Blue crab potato"), CAVE MORAY(18177,25,"Cave Moray"), CAVE MORAY POTATO(18117,280,"Cave moray potato"), [/code] Thank you, I VAIN I this is one for you as you always reply.

item.title: [PI]How do I add eating custom food from packs[PI]
item.dc:creator: @zach55200 zach55200
item.description:
@zach55200 wrote:

here replace food.java with this

package server.model.players;

import java.util.HashMap;

/**

  • @author Sanity
    */

public class Food {

private Client c;

public Food (Client c) {
	this.c = c;	
}
public static enum FoodToEat {		
	ROCKTAIL(15272,1,"Rocktail"),
	MANTA(391,22,"Manta Ray"),
	SHARK(385,20,"Shark"),
	LOBSTER(379,12,"Lobster"),
	TROUT(333,7,"Trout"),
	SALMON(329,9,"Salmon"),
	SWORDFISH(373,14,"Swordfish"),
	TUNA(361,10,"Tuna"),
	MONKFISH(7946,16,"Monkfish"),
	SEA_TURTLE(397,21,"Sea Turtle"),
	CAKE(1891,4,"Cake"),
	BASS(365,13,"Bass"),
	COD(339,7,"Cod"),
	POTATO(1942,1,"Potato"),
	BAKED_POTATO(6701,4,"Baked Potato"),
	POTATO_WITH_CHEESE(6705,16,"Potato with Cheese"),
	EGG_POTATO(7056,16,"Egg Potato"),
	CHILLI_POTATO(7054,14,"Chilli Potato"),
	MUSHROOM_POTATO(7058,20,"Mushroom Potato"),
	TUNA_POTATO(7060,22,"Tuna Potato"),
	SHRIMPS(315,3,"Shrimps"),
	HERRING(347,5,"Herring"),
	SARDINE(325,4,"Sardine"),
	CHOCOLATE_CAKE(1897,5,"Chocolate Cake"),
	ANCHOVIES(319,1,"Anchovies"),
	PLAIN_PIZZA(2289,7,"Plain Pizza"),
	MEAT_PIZZA(2293,8,"Meat Pizza"),
	ANCHOVY_PIZZA(2297,9,"Anchovy Pizza"),
	PINEAPPLE_PIZZA(2301,11,"Pineapple Pizza"),
	BREAD(2309,5,"Bread"),
	APPLE_PIE(2323,7,"Apple Pie"),
	REDBERRY_PIE(2325,5,"Redberry Pie"),
	MEAT_PIE(2327,6,"Meat Pie"),
	PIKE(351,8,"Pike"),
	POTATO_WITH_BUTTER(6703,14,"Potato with Butter"),
	BANANA(1963,2,"Banana"),
	PEACH(6883,8,"Peach"),
	ORANGE(2108,2,"Orange"),
	PINEAPPLE_RINGS(2118,2,"Pineapple Rings"),
	PINEAPPLE_CHUNKS(2116,2,"Pineapple Chunks");
	
	
	private int id; private int heal; private String name;
	
	private FoodToEat(int id, int heal, String name) {
		this.id = id;
		this.heal = heal;
		this.name = name;		
	}
	
	public int getId() {
		return id;
	}

	public int getHeal() {
		return heal;
	}
	
	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}
	public static HashMap <Integer,FoodToEat> food = new HashMap<Integer,FoodToEat>();
	
	public static FoodToEat forId(int id) {
		return food.get(id);
	}
	
	static {
	for (FoodToEat f : FoodToEat.values())
		food.put(f.getId(), f);
	}
}

public void eat(int id, int slot) {
	if (c.duelRule[6]) {
		c.sendMessage("You may not eat in this duel.");
		return;
	}
	if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay >= 1500 && c.playerLevel[3] > 0) {
		c.getCombat().resetPlayerAttack();
		c.attackTimer += 2;
		c.startAnimation(829);
		c.getItems().deleteItem(id,slot,1);
		FoodToEat f = FoodToEat.food.get(id);
		if (c.playerLevel[3] < c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3])) {
			c.playerLevel[3] += f.getHeal();
			if (c.playerLevel[3] > c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]))
				c.playerLevel[3] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]);
		}
		c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
		c.getPA().refreshSkill(3);
		c.sendMessage("You eat the " + f.getName() + ".");
	}		
}


public boolean isFood(int id) {
	return FoodToEat.food.containsKey(id);
}

}
